answerText: Tony Kushner[10] This playwright attacked the film industry in his play Speed-the-Plow, while the real estate industry was the target of his Glengarry Glen Ross.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Michigan A + George Mason | 4 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: For 10 points each, name these contemporary American dramatists. [10] Roy Cohn and Ethel Rosenberg are two historical characters that appear in this man's two-part play in which the homosexual Prior Walter has several visions, Angels in America.
